cause.description:
The Jesse Rohde Foundation is a non-profit organization, which is working to end preventable disease in africa through equitable education and local health care. Investing in the potential of Africa's youth to become leaders in the fight against preventable disease - this is what The Jesse Rohde Foundation stands for.
1. to provide equitable education for Africa's youth
2. to end preventable disease in Africa
cause.mission: provide equitable education and healthcare in Africa
cause.name: Jesse Rohde Foundation
